properties.media:imagetext:
El Calvador
• INTERCONTINENTAL
SAN SALVADOR, EL SALVADOR
CABLE ADDRESS: INHOTELCOR
OFFICEOF THE MANAGER
Greetings:
We are very pleased to present you with this first day of issue of the
El Salvador stamps commemorating the opening of the El Salvador
Intercontinental Hotel, largest and most modern in Central America, on
June 28, 1958. The envelope is our special design prepared for this
unusual philatelic occasion.
The commemorative stamp was designed by Courvoisier of Switzerland.
Stamps of the following denominations have been printed in the
number indicated:
1,000,000 of 3 centavos, color brown
2,000.000 of 6 centavos, color red
2,000,000 of 10 centavos, color blue
1,000.000 of 15 centavos, color green
500,000 of 20 centavos, color violet
500.000 of 30 centavos, color Paris green
We hope you will preserve this commemorative first day cover and
perhaps the opportunity will arise for you one day actually to stay at
the El Salvador Intercontinental. Its 210 beautifully appointed rooms
and suites, each with private balcony, insure you the ultimate in comfort.
Its terraced pool, sun drenched Cabana Club and gay "El Cortijo" cocktail
lounge, will heighten your enjoyment of this great new Central
American rendezvous.
Sincere
1 10. н
MARIO DE GENOVA
General Manager
AN INTERCONTINENTAL HOTEL
